articles.title: v1.15.0

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Autodesk AutoCAD. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
articles.title: ZDI-22-944: Autodesk AutoCAD CATPart File Parsing Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-943: Parallels Desktop Updater Race Condition Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-942: Parallels Desktop Updater Incorrect Permission Assignment Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-941: Parallels Desktop Tools Untrusted Pointer Dereference Information Disclosure Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-940: Parallels Desktop ACPI Out-Of-Bounds Read Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Tencent WeChat. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
articles.title: ZDI-22-939: Tencent WeChat WXAM Decoder Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Tencent WeChat. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
articles.title: ZDI-22-938: Tencent WeChat WXAM Decoder Heap-based Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files on affected installations of Advantech iView. Although authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability, the existing authentication mechanism can be bypassed.
articles.title: ZDI-22-937: Advantech iView set_useraccount UserName SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech iView. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-936: Advantech iView runProViewUpgrade fwfilename Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Advantech iView. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-935: Advantech iView NetworkServlet backupDatabase backup_filename Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
